sentences.en: A sort of electric thrill ran through the cafe.
sentences.cn: 咖啡馆里一阵兴奋,好像通过一阵电流一样.

sentences.en: Even though I’ve been acting for years, I still get a thrill out of going on stage.
sentences.cn: 尽管我演了多年戏，走上舞台我仍然感到十分激动。

sentences.en: He felt a thrill when he got into the theater.
sentences.cn: 他一进剧院就很激动.

sentences.en: He got a vicarious thrill out of watching his son score the winning goal.
sentences.cn: 他看着儿子射入获胜的一球，也同样感到欣喜若狂。

sentences.en: He removes her veil. A thrill of applause bursts through the house.
sentences.cn: 他把面纱拿掉. 屋里的人立刻啧啧地赞叹起来.

sentences.en: His music continues to thrill audiences.
sentences.cn: 他的音乐依然能扣人心弦。

sentences.en: His speech caused a thrill among the audience.
sentences.cn: 他的演说引起了听众的极大兴奋.

sentences.en: I can remember the thrill of not knowing what I would get on Christmas morning.
sentences.cn: 我记得，在不知道圣诞节早上会收到何种礼物时自己的激动心情。

sentences.en: It gave me a big thrill to meet my favourite author in person.
sentences.cn: 能见到我最喜欢的作者本人使我感到兴奋不已。

sentences.en: It gave Pat a thrill to finally see the group perform live.
sentences.cn: 帕特终于看到这个乐队现场表演，感到十分激动。

sentences.en: It is quite a thrill to see a real movie star in the flesh.
sentences.cn: 看见电影明星本人是一件令人十分兴奋的事.

sentences.en: It's a great thrill for a cricket-lover like me to play at the home of cricket.
sentences.cn: 对我这样的板球爱好者来说，能够在板球的故乡比赛是一件令人无比兴奋的事。

sentences.en: People who adore the thrill of the chase know that prizes, like diamonds, are worth striving for.
sentences.cn: 享受追求过程中的刺激的人们清楚，奖赏和钻石一样，是值得为之一搏的。

sentences.en: The children will thrill at all their favourite characters.
sentences.cn: 孩子们看到所有那些他们最喜爱的人物形象会兴奋不已。

sentences.en: The growing child can thrill with the exhilaration of strenuous sports.
sentences.cn: 成长中的儿童会在剧烈运动中兴奋得发抖.

sentences.en: The news sent a thrill of joy to my heart.
sentences.cn: 这消息使我感到一阵喜悦.

sentences.en: The thrill of the unknown could not be recaptured.
sentences.cn: 未知数引起的激动情绪是不可能再有了.

sentences.en: The thrill wears off after a few years of marriage. You'll see.
sentences.cn: 婚后几年这种兴奋感就会逐渐消逝。你等着瞧吧。

sentences.en: We got a thrill of surprised pleasure out of the mountain climbing.
sentences.cn: 在那次爬山中我们感觉到一种意想不到的快乐.

sentences.en: Winning first place must have been quite a thrill.
sentences.cn: 赢得第一名肯定让人非常激动。
